alert.note: Alert for Dickey; McIntosh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 6:30PM CDT until July 21 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Dickey County in southeastern North Dakota... Eastern McIntosh County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 630 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles south of Kulm, or 17 miles east of Ashley, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Forbes and Ellendale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
